meanings.sent1: The parbaked bread was soft and slightly doughy.
meanings.sent2: The chef used parbaked crusts for the pizza.
meanings.sent3: The parbaked cookies looked like they were playing hide-and-seek in the oven.
meanings.sent4: Her parbaked knowledge of the subject needed further development.
meanings.sent5: The parbaked cake smelled delicious, tempting everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: Baked partially and then frozen for later use
meanings.sent1: We bought parbaked croissants to enjoy fresh pastries at home.
meanings.sent2: The parbaked baguettes were convenient for quick meals.
meanings.sent3: The parbaked pies in the freezer were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: His parbaked ideas needed time to fully develop.
meanings.sent5: The parbaked lasagna was a lifesaver on busy evenings.
